data.message: Thanks to Facebook, keeping the connection for us all!

replies.message: It's our pleasure, Barbara! We're so glad you're part of our community. -Kate
Facebook have u read my Comment Can u Help Us?
Thank you Facebook even if something should be posted but now we really the word is and people too
Facebook  i love you,i am a shut in and my life is full due to facebook.i love it and thank you.u have gave me life .i had \cancer,stroke cripple and u give me joy!!!
Letting me keep in touch with friends and family so quickly and easy. Thank you
Why didn't you offer an American flag overlay when we had a terror attack in California like you did for France?

POR MAS LEJOS QUE NOS ENCONTREMOS EN EL MUNDO - FACEBOOK NOS ACERCA AL SITIO QUE QUE DESEAMOS ESTAR- CON NUESTRA FAMILIA Y AMISTADES-                        YA NO HAY DISTANCIAS LA TEGNOLOGIA DÍA DÍA NOS ACERCA MÁS-
I got a message in my messenger today.  Says I need to click on a link or my Facebook will be shut down. Is this a scam
Facebook reminds me of many old friends. The music cheers me up happy or sad.

Michael Rae Keihn It's a Scam,.. Check or Report it to Face book,.. let them know with a screenshot if possible,.. they may can fix that issue,.. Then delete that Message ,.. Do not open it,.. Let face book know of it as soon as u can.
Thanks for choosing our area to locate   And for being able to stay in touch with family and friends. And yes I like playing the games to
This is beautiful ...face of joy and tears and of love and war....Face of life...thank you Face Book for sharing <3
Thanks to Facebook we can connect and go down memory lane

This sounds like spam, Michael. Please report this message by going to the conversation, opening the Actions menu and selecting 'Report as Spam or Abuse'. Thanks for taking the time to keep Facebook a safe and welcoming environment. -Jordan
